Others: Portland Trail Blazers forward Deni Avdija had a career-worst 10 turnovers in a 125-103 loss to the Philadelphia 76ers.
Joel Embiid scored a game-high 37 points for the 76ers, while seven-time All-Star center registered an impressive +26 plus-minus.
The Trail Blazers committed a season-worst 26 turnovers, which the 76ers converted into 36 points.
The loss plummets Portland to 11-21, the sixth-worst record in the league.
